sn44.2:17.7: saccato thetato tathāgate anupalabbhiyamāne → saccato vā tathato vā anupabbhanīyasabhāvo (cck, sya1ed); saccato vā tathato vā anupalabbhiyamāno (sya2ed, mr); saccato thetato tathāgate anupalabbhyamāne (pts1ed); saccato thetato tathāgate anupalabbhamāne (?) | veyyākaraṇaṁ → vyākaraṇāya (bj)
